rm F11.x
rm F12.y
rm F13.z
rm F21.x
rm F22.y
rm F23.z
-- x.go --
package m

func F11(x, y, z int) {}
func F12(x, y, z int) {}
func F13(x, y, z int) {}

func F21(x int, y string, z float64) {}
func F22(x int, y string, z float64) {}
func F23(x int, y string, z float64) {}

-- stdout --
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -1,10 +1,9 @@
 package m

-func F11(x, y, z int) {}
-func F12(x, y, z int) {}
-func F13(x, y, z int) {}
-
-func F21(x int, y string, z float64) {}
-func F22(x int, y string, z float64) {}
-func F23(x int, y string, z float64) {}
+func F11(y, z int) {}
+func F12(x, z int) {}
+func F13(x, y int) {}

+func F21(y string, z float64) {}
+func F22(x int, z float64)    {}
+func F23(x int, y string)     {}
